item.title: 早间竞标：科技界对人工智能疑虑的焦虑
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的重要事件【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 科技股大跌后华尔街期货下滑；财报、美联储会议成为焦点
item.description: 继华尔街科技股大跌之后，美国股指期货周三下跌，因为投资者在为更多零售业财报和本周晚些时候至关重要的美联储座谈会做准备。【原文：U.S. stock index futures declined on Wednesday, following a tech selloff on Wall Street, as investors geared up for more retail earnings and a crucial Federal Reserve symposium later this week.】

item.title: 塔吉特提拔内部人士菲德尔克为首席执行官，保持年度预测不变
item.description: 塔吉特周三任命内部人士迈克尔-菲德尔克（Michael Fiddelke）为新任首席执行官，接替长期以来的顶头上司布莱恩-康奈尔（Brian Cornell），并在门店客流量和平均收入回升的帮助下，业绩超过了季度预期。【原文：Target named insider Michael Fiddelke on Wednesday as its new CEO to succeed long-time top boss Brian Cornell, and beat quarterly estimates, helped by a recovery in traffic at its stores and average receipts.】

item.title: 美国对中国石墨征收关税为印度 Epsilon 带来机遇
item.description: 在华盛顿对中国进口产品征收反倾销税之后，印度 Epsilon Advanced Materials 公司的一位高层管理人员表示，该公司正在迅速行动，以达成向日本和韩国的美国电池制造商供应关键零部件的交易。【原文：India's Epsilon Advanced Materials is moving swiftly to close deals to supply critical components to Japanese and South Korean battery makers in the U.S., a top executive said, after Washington imposed anti-dumping duties on Chinese imports.】

item.title: 空客英国公司工人将就薪酬问题举行为期 10 天的罢工
item.description: 工会 Unite 周三表示，英国数千名空中客车公司的工人将从下月起举行为期 10 天的罢工，要求提高工资待遇，这将威胁到飞机机翼的生产。【原文：Thousands of Airbus workers in Britain will go on strike for 10 days starting next month over a demand for better pay, threatening to disrupt production of aircraft wings, trade union Unite said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 腾讯支持的开发商推出热门游戏《黑色神话：悟空传》的后续作品
item.description: 由中国科技巨头腾讯支持的游戏科学公司周三发布了去年大热游戏《黑色神话：悟空传》的后续预告片，令游戏爱好者大吃一惊。【原文：Game Science, backed by Chinese tech giant Tencent , surprised games enthusiasts on Wednesday by releasing a trailer for a follow-up to last year's smash hit "Black Myth: Wukong".】

item.title: 劳氏公司将以 88 亿美元收购基金会建材公司，以促进承包商业务发展
item.description: 劳氏公司（Lowe's Cos）周三表示，它已同意以近 88 亿美元的价格收购室内建筑产品分销商基金会建材公司（Foundation Building Materials），从而加快了向专业建筑商市场的扩张。【原文：Lowe's Cos said on Wednesday it has agreed to buy interior building products distributor Foundation Building Materials for nearly $8.8 billion, stepping up its expansion into the professional builder market.】

item.title: 斯沃琪广告引发反弹，在多元化退步之际将重点放在高风险活动上
item.description: 在这个注意力短暂、白宫向多元化计划宣战的时代，企业正在接受更前卫的营销方式。但这一策略也有风险。【原文：In an era of short attention spans and a White House that has declared war on diversity programs, companies are embracing edgier marketing. But the strategy can carry risks.】

item.title: 雅诗兰黛预计年度利润低于预期，原因是受到关税冲击
item.description: 雅诗兰黛（Estee Lauder）周三预测的年度利润低于华尔街预期，这家化妆品巨头正努力应对美国和中国市场的持续疲软以及关税的不确定性，导致其股价在盘前交易中下跌约9%。【原文：Estee Lauder forecast annual profit below Wall Street estimates on Wednesday, as the cosmetics giant grapples with persistent weakness in the U.S. and China markets and tariff uncertainty, sending its shares down about 9% in premarket trading.】

item.title: 独家报道：美国海军正在组建一支无人机舰队来对抗中国。进展并不顺利。
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统自上任以来，一直将无人机群的实战化作为军事工作的重中之重。但是，五角大楼在推动建立自主舰队的过程中遇到了一系列挫折。【原文：Since returning to office, President Donald Trump has made fielding swarms of drones a top military priority. But the Pentagon has faced a series of setbacks in its push to build a fleet of autonomous vessels.】

item.title: 美联储会议纪要将显示沃勒尔和鲍曼是否支持尽快降息
item.description: 美国联邦储备委员会上个月决定维持利率不变，这引起了两位最高央行行长的异议，他们希望降低利率以防止就业市场进一步疲软，而周三对为期两天的会议的解读可能会显示他们的担忧是否已开始引起其他决策者的共鸣，或许会加强下个月开始降低借贷成本的预期。【原文：Last month's decision by the U.S. Federal Reserve to hold interest rates unchanged prompted dissents from two top central bankers who wanted to lower rates to guard against further weakening of the job market, and a readout of that two-day gathering on Wednesday could show whether their concerns had started to resonate with other policymakers, perhaps reinforcing expectations that borrowing-cost reductions could begin next month.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，麦当劳将提供打折套餐
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周三报道，麦当劳及其特许经营商同意将八种受欢迎的套餐打折 15%，并提供 5 美元和 8 美元的特价套餐。【原文：McDonald's and its franchisees agreed to discount eight popular combo meal offerings by 15%, and offer $5 and $8 specials, the Wall Street Journal reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 数据显示，6 月份中国外国品牌手机销量下降 31.3
item.description: 路透社根据一家隶属于政府的研究公司周三公布的数据计算得出，包括苹果公司 iPhone 在内的外国品牌手机 6 月份在中国的销量同比下降了 31.3%。【原文：Sales of foreign-branded phones, including Apple Inc's iPhone, declined 31.3% year-on-year in China in June, according to Reuters' calculations based on data released on Wednesday by a government-affiliated research firm.】

item.title: 广告业务疲软，中国百度季度营收不及预期
item.description: 周三，中国搜索引擎巨头百度的季度营收出现下滑，略低于市场预期，表明在经济长期不确定的情况下，广告市场持续疲软。【原文：Chinese search engine giant Baidu's , quarterly revenue fell and was just shy of market estimates on Wednesday, signaling persistent weakness in the advertising market amid prolonged economic uncertainty.】

item.title: 日本央行行长上田将赴杰克逊霍尔参加美联储会议
item.description: 日本央行周三表示，日本央行行长上田一夫将从周四起前往杰克逊霍尔，参加在怀俄明州举行的美国联邦储备委员会年会。【原文：Bank of Japan Governor Kazuo Ueda will travel to Jackson Hole from Thursday to join the U.S. Fed's annual conference in Wyoming, the Japanese central bank said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 特朗普终止包裹关税减免，北欧邮政运营商暂停对美发货
item.description: 瑞典和挪威邮政集团PostNord和Posten Bring周三表示，在美国取消允许低价值包裹免税入境的海关税漏洞之前，它们将暂停向美国发货。【原文：Swedish and Norwegian postal groups PostNord and Posten Bring are pausing shipments to the United States ahead of the scrapping of a U.S. customs tax loophole that allows duty-free entry for low-value parcels, they said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 拉加德：美欧贸易协议与欧洲央行的基准假设相去不远
item.description: 欧洲央行行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德（Christine Lagarde）周三表示，美国和欧盟之间的贸易协议略高一些，但与欧洲央行假设的基准线相差不远。【原文：The trade deal between the United States and the EU is somewhat higher but not far from the baseline assumed by the ECB, Christine Lagarde, the bank's president, said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 以 Trafigura 为首的财团计划在 2025 年底前敲定美国贷款协议
item.description: 洛比托大西洋铁路公司（LAR）首席执行官告诉路透社，该公司的目标是在今年年底前与美国国际开发金融公司（DFC）敲定一项5.33亿美元的贷款协议。【原文：Lobito Atlantic Railway (LAR) aims to finalise by the end of this year a $533 million loan deal with the U.S. International Development Finance Corporation (DFC) that is vital for the upgrade of its Angolan concession, LAR's CEO told Reuters.】

item.title: 破产珠宝零售商 Claire's 将出售北美业务
item.description: 时尚珠宝零售商 Claire's 周三表示，将把北美业务出售给私募股权公司 Ames Watson，具体金额未透露，该公司的目标是在进行美国破产程序的同时减少损失。【原文：Fashion jewelry retailer Claire's said on Wednesday it would sell its North America business to private equity firm Ames Watson for an undisclosed amount, as the company aims to cut losses while navigating ongoing U.S. bankruptcy proceedings.】

item.title: 诺基亚前首席执行官加入芬兰量子公司董事会
item.description: 诺基亚前首席执行官佩卡-伦德马克（Pekka Lundmark）周三表示，他将作为投资者和董事会成员加入芬兰量子计算公司 QMill。【原文：Former Nokia CEO Pekka Lundmark will join Finnish quantum computing company QMill as an investor and a board member, the company said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 智利 SQM 公司季度净利润因锂价下跌而下降约 59
item.description: 全球第二大锂生产商智利 SQM 公司周三报告称，由于锂价格下跌，该公司的季度利润下降了 59%。【原文：Chile's SQM , the world's second-largest lithium producer, reported a 59% decline in quarterly profit on Wednesday due to lower lithium prices.】

item.title: 聚焦德意志银行总裁在十多年前风险交易中的角色面临审查
item.description: 2013 年，德意志银行将调查意大利受审查的衍生品交易这一敏感任务交给了新星克里斯蒂安-苏云（Christian Sewing）。【原文：In 2013, Deutsche Bank handed Christian Sewing, a rising star, the sensitive assignment of investigating derivatives trades under scrutiny in Italy.】

item.title: 早间竞标科技破坏派对
item.description: Rae Wee 对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Rae Wee】

item.title: 监督机构预测未来十年美国预算赤字将增加 1 万亿美元
item.description: 一家预算监督机构周三表示，由于税收和支出立法以及关税的影响，未来十年美国联邦预算赤字将比国会预算办公室1月份预测的高出近1万亿美元。【原文：U.S. federal budget deficits will be nearly $1 trillion higher over the next decade than projected in January by the Congressional Budget Office as a result of tax and spending legislation and tariffs, a budget watchdog said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 食客避开餐馆，零售商有望受益
item.description: 据数据、分析师和公司高管称，有现金意识的消费者选择在店内用餐而不是外出就餐，这为超市和食品配送公司带来了盈利好转的前景。【原文：Cash-conscious consumers choosing to eat in rather than dine out have raised the prospect of an upturn in earnings for supermarkets and food delivery firms, according to data, analysts and company executives.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，Canva 以 420 亿美元的估值开始出售员工股票
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周二报道，澳大利亚平面设计和协作平台 Canva 以 420 亿美元的估值启动了员工股票销售。【原文：Australian graphic design and collaboration platform Canva launched an employee stock sale at a valuation of $42 billion, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 中国 7 月稀土磁铁出口创六个月新高
item.description: 中国稀土磁铁的出口量在 7 月份创下了六个月来的新高，这标志着在中美达成贸易协议后，电动汽车和风力涡轮机所用的关键矿产的流通量持续恢复。【原文：China's exports of rare earth magnets hit a six-month high in July, marking a persistent recovery in the flow of critical minerals used in electric vehicles and wind turbines after a Sino-U.S. trade deal.】

item.title: 拉布布制造商 Pop Mart 高层看好动画、主题公园和全球扩张
item.description: Pop Mart 公司高管周三表示，他们看好该公司专有的艺术玩具，包括大受欢迎的丑陋可爱的拉布布娃娃，在动画电影和主题公园景点中出演的机会。【原文：Pop Mart executives said on Wednesday they are optimistic about opportunities for the firm's proprietary art toys, including smash hit ugly-cute Labubu doll, to star in animated films and theme park attractions.】

item.title: 新西兰央行将利率降至 3 年低点，表示将采取更多宽松政策；新西兰元暴跌
item.description: 新西兰中央银行周三将其政策利率下调了 25 个基点，降至 3.00% 的三年低点，并表示在未来几个月内将进一步下调利率，因为决策者们警告说，国内和全球经济增长将面临不利因素。【原文：New Zealand's central bank cut its policy rate by 25 basis points to a three-year low of 3.00% on Wednesday, and flagged further reductions in coming months as policymakers warned of domestic and global headwinds to growth.】

item.title: 乌克兰和谈陷入僵局，供应担忧再起，油价上涨
item.description: 油价周三上涨，原因是供应担忧再次出现，而结束俄罗斯入侵乌克兰的和平谈判可能需要更长的时间，这使得对俄罗斯原油的制裁继续存在，并提高了对其买家进一步限制的可能性。【原文：Oil prices rose on Wednesday as supply concerns are resurfacing while peace talks ending Russia's invasion of Ukraine are likely to take longer, leaving in place sanctions on Russian crude and raising the chance of further restrictions on its buyers.】
